acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: The case was posted for examination of EO. EO is absent. Sri Surjya Kanta Charah, Bailor of the accused has appeared and filed Pt. No. 1714/2019 annexing the original death certificate of the accused Sri Ram Kumar Chouhan stating that accused expired on 15.01.2019. Seen the death certificate. Case is abated against the accused. Original death certificate is returned to the bailor/petitioner. Bailor is discharged from his liability.
